author: Juli√°n Burgos
title: Javi Guerra y Hugo Duro se ausentan del entrenamiento por enfermedad - AS.com
text: Javi Guerra y Hugo Duro se ausentan del entrenamiento por enfermedad Los dos jugadores, que ser√°n titulares el pr√≥ximo martes ante el Villarreal, sufren un proceso gripal. La plantilla del Valencia no es ajena a los virus que asolan en estas semanas a media Espa√±a. Esta ma√±ana, de hecho, se han ausentado del entrenamiento dos jugadores que deben de ser titulares el pr√≥ximo martes, en Mestalla, contra el Villarreal: Javi Guerra y Hugo Duro. Los dos futbolistas valencianistas sufren un proceso v√≠rico-gripal que les ha impedido entrenarse esta ma√±ana con el resto de sus compa√±eros, tras [hacerlo ayer por la tarde, en Mestalla](https://as.com/futbol/primera/gaya-de-regreso-ante-medio-mestalla-n/). No obstante, tanto el mediocentro, que regresa tras cumplir dos partidos de sanci√≥n, como el delantero centro, deben estar recuperados para afrontar el derbi de la Comunitat Valenciana el pr√≥ximo martes, ante el Submarino. Como viene siendo habitual en los tres √∫ltimos meses, tampoco ha estado en la sesi√≥n Andr√© Almeida, quien tiene una fractura en una v√©rtebra y no tiene fecha prevista de vuelta. Diakhaby ha sido el otro ausente, aunque el franco-guineano, que cumplir√° su partido de sanci√≥n ante el Villarreal, ya no se le espera hasta finales de enero ya que se marcha a la Copa de √Åfrica. En el plano positivo est√° de nuevo Jos√© Luis Gay√†, que ha vuelto a entrenarse esta ma√±ana con normalidad. El capit√°n, si no surge ning√∫n contratiempo de √∫ltima hora ser√° de la partida ante el Villarreal tras tener que parar varios partidos por diversas molestias. El lateral ha trabajado a buen ritmo y ya es uno m√°s del grupo. Sigue el [canal de Diario AS en WhatsApp](https://www.whatsapp.com/channel/0029VaAasdA7j6g745nz9M10), donde encontrar√°s todas las claves deportivas del d√≠a. Para poder comentar debes estar registrado y haber iniciado sesi√≥n. [¬øOlvidaste la contrase√±a?](https://asfan.as.com/recontrasena/?backURL=https%3A%2F%2Fas.com%2F&o=COMAS&prod=REGhttps%3A%2F%2Fas.com%2F)

author: Indiablooms
title: American Airlines flight makes 'insane landing' at London Airport amid Storm Gerrit | Indiablooms - First Portal on Digital News Management
text: American Airlines flight makes 'insane landing' at London Airport amid Storm Gerrit An American Airlines flight struggled and experienced a bumpy landing at the Heathrow Airport in London amid strong winds caused due to Storm Gerrit on Wednesday. A video of the landing was shared on X by BigJetTV where the wings of the Boeing 777 were seen tilting and its wings angling towards the ground on the runway. Big Jet TV posted on X: "American 777 insane landing at London Heathrow! Caught during our livestream at @HeathrowAirport. Strong, gusting crosswind elements catching-out even the most seasoned pilots! Wouldn‚Äôt have liked being the NFP on this one watch the flight surfaces." American 777 insane landing at London Heathrow!‚Äî BIG JET TV (@BigJetTVLIVE) Caught during our livestream at [@HeathrowAirport]. Strong, gusting crosswind elements catching-out even the most seasoned pilots! Wouldn‚Äôt have liked being the NFP on this one üòÇ watch the flight surfaces Get involved: what‚Äôs‚Ä¶ [pic.twitter.com/PjfqhsQjX2] [December 27, 2023] Several flights were cancelled and air traffic saw major delays at Heathrow amid strong winds caused due to the storm. UK's flag carrier British Airways reportedly cancelled 13 flights due to inclement weather. In Ireland, Dublin Airport remained unscathed, though Cork saw four diversions, to Dublin and Shannon, reported CNN. UK Met Office on Wednesday (December 27, 2023) predicted Storm Gerrit would bring strong winds and heavy rain to many parts of the UK on Wednesday, with wintry hazards also likely, especially across northern Scotland. Met Office Chief Meteorologist Frank Saunders had said: ‚ÄúStorm Gerrit will run towards western UK on Wednesday and bring with it potential impacts for much of the UK." ‚ÄúWinds across southern coastal areas of England will be strong, possibly peaking around 70 mph on exposed coastlines, but more widely around 50-60 mph within the warning area," Saundaers said. author: gqlshare
title: Gala honors Boyertown Citizens of the Year
text:
Local News Gala honors Boyertown Citizens of the Year Celebration honors those who have gone above and beyond for community From left to right: Special Recognition Award recipient Paul and Jane Stahl of Bear Fever, Mentor of the Year Tim Bauman, First Responder of the Year Gary Conrad, Citizen of the Year Rick Drumheller and Senior of the Year Abi Dawson were honored at the 71st Boyertown Citizen of the Year Gala on April 12. (Photo courtesy of Boyertown Citizen of the Year committee) By | PUBLISHED: April 16, 2025 at 5:09 PM EDT BOYERTOWN ‚Äî The 71st Boyertown Citizen of the Year Gala honored those who have made a lasting impact on the community.
‚ÄúThe gala is a celebration that honors individuals who have gone above and beyond for our community, while fostering a sense of unity, gratitude, and belonging among us all,‚Äù Boyertown Citizen of the Year committee member Lindsey Mason, and 66th Citizen of the Year recipient, said in a statement.
About 125 community members came out to celebrate this year‚Äôs recipients at the April 12 Gala held at the Boyertown Museum of Historic Vehicles.
‚ÄúThe atmosphere was one of heartfelt celebration ‚Äî warm, inspiring, and deeply connected,‚Äù said Mason.

author: M. A.K.L. Dissanayaka
title: Novel Platinum-Free Counter-Electrode with PEDOT: PSS-Treated Graphite/Activated Carbon for Efficient Dye-Sensitized Solar Cells
text: Developing an efficient material as a counter electrode (CE) with excellent catalytic activity, intrinsic stability, and low cost is essential for the commercial application of dye-sensitized solar cells (DSSCs). Photovoltaic properties DSSCs fabricated with low-cost and platinum-free CEs based on different mixtures of carbon allotropes graphite (GR), activated carbon (AC) and PEDOT: PSS films. The DSSCs assembled with PEDOT: PSS/GR/AC showed an impressive photovoltaic conversion efficiency of 4.60%, compared to 4.06% for DSSCs with GR/AC CE or 1.66% for PEDOT: PSS alone or 6.56 % for Pt under the illumination 100 mW cm‚àí 2 (AM 1.5 G) due to the superior electrocatalytic activity and the conductivity of AC and PEDOT: PSS. The fabricated carbon counter electrodes were extensively characterized by using scanning electron microscopy (SEM), X-ray diffraction (XRD), Raman spectroscopy, cyclic voltammetry (CV), Tafel measurements and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS). The CV, EIS and Tafel measurements indicated that the PEDOT: PSS/Graphite/AC composite film has low charge-transfer resistance on the electrolyte/CE interface and high catalytic activity for the reduction of triiodide to iodide than the GR/AC CEs. It is potentially feasible that such a carbon configuration can be used as a counter electrode, replacing the more expensive Pt in DSSCs.

author: Claire Barrett
title: ‚ÄòMay the 4th be with you‚Äô: How World War II influenced ‚ÄòStar Wars‚Äô
text:
‚ÄúBy accident, a great deal [of J.R.R. Tolkien‚Äôs book series ‚ÄúThe Lord of the Rings‚Äù] can be read topically,‚Äù Maj. Warren Lewis, brother to C.S. Lewis, wrote in possibly the first ever review of the novel in 1949. ‚ÄúThe Shire standing for England, Rohan for France, Gondor the Germany of the future, Sauron for Stalin.‚Äù
And while Tolkien later explicitly rejected the idea that his ‚Äústory was an allegory of any historical event, most of all the recent war against Nazism ‚Ä¶ for all such protestations, Lewis had clearly been on to something back in 1949,‚Äù historian Alan Allport wrote in his 2020 book about the social and military history of the U.K. during World War II, ‚ÄúBritain at Bay.‚Äù
Rather than singularly weaving a mythopoeic fantasy world, Allport contended, Tolkien‚Äôs future audience ‚Äúwas going to see associations between events in Middle Earth and those in their own world.‚Äù
Tolkien, however, was not the first nor the last to draw inspiration from the cataclysmic bloodletting that was the Second World War.
Today, as fans celebrate May the Fourth (be with you), one does not have to stray far to glean that the galaxy of ‚ÄúStar Wars‚Äù is rife with WWII-based allegories ‚Äî and its fanbase might equal, if not surpass, Tolkien‚Äôs.
‚ÄúStar Wars‚Äù creator George Lucas famously studied over 25 hours of footage from
World War II dogfights and jittery newsreel imagery while researching for the films ‚Äî even using the footage as placeholders in the film before special effects were added.
‚ÄúSo one second you‚Äôre with the Wookiee in the spaceship and the next you‚Äôre in ‚ÄòThe Bridges at Toko-Ri.‚Äô It was like, ‚ÄòGeorge, what is going on?‚Äô‚Äù Willard Huyck, a screenwriter and personal friend of Lucas,
stated in a 1997 interview.
Though the b-roll was eventually edited out, the aerial tactics established in World War II remain visible.
One such shot, according to National WWII Museum and Memorial curator
Corey Graff, ‚Äúshowed aircraft peeling out of formation and dropping from sight. The clip was used as a model for the memorable shot of Rebel craft diving to attack the Death Star. One at a time, the fictional spaceships elegantly ‚Äòaileron roll‚Äô across the screen, mimicking the movements of the 1940s aircraft almost exactly.‚Äù
Entire books have been devoted to such analogies, but we‚Äôve summed up a few of our favorites for some May the Fourth enjoyment.
The Millennium Falcon‚Äôs cockpit came from the Boeing B-29 Fortress
After studying hours of WWII footage, Lucas became particularly enamored with the cockpit of B-29s ‚Äî the famous bomber known for dropping the atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki in 1945.
The result? The cockpit of Han Solo‚Äôs beloved Millennium Falcon looks like it was lifted straight out of Boeing‚Äôs blueprints, replete with the B-29‚Ä≤s signature greenhouse-style cockpit. And, exactly like on the Superfortress, the Falcon sports defensive gun turrets ‚Äî which come in handy when battling a Death Star.
The Empire‚Äôs similarities to Nazi Germany
From stormtroopers to Imperial officers‚Äô uniforms and even Darth Vader‚Äôs helmet, which resembles those worn by the Wehrmacht during WWII, the analogies between Nazi Germany and the Galactic Empire are not exactly subtle.
The gradual rise of Hitler from German chancellor to Nazi dictator is further mirrored in the rise of Darth Sidious, or Sheev Palpatine, from chancellor to world‚Äôs most in-need-of-facial-moisturizer emperor.
Depictions of Star Wars spaceships were influenced by WWII fighters
Once again Lucas turned to World War II aviation for inspiration to give his spaceships unique sounds. According to Ian D‚ÄôCosta for
Tacairnet, sounds couldn‚Äôt easily be synthesized in the same way studios can create movie sound effects today. To get around that, Lucas sent out sound designer Ben Burtt to Reno Air Races in Nevada, where he was allowed to record the noise of P-51 Mustangs racing overhead.
Burtt later recalled, ‚ÄúI just said, ‚ÄòI want to record some planes,‚Äô and they said ‚ÄòYeah? Then go on out there.‚Äô You could never do that nowadays. I was out at the pylons, and planes were passing 15 feet above my head. They were so fast that I could hardly see them go by; they were just a blur, though I could smell the oil and exhaust. ... Almost all of the spaceships came out of those Mojave recordings, including the Falcon.‚Äù
The Death Star trench run was inspired by the British Dambuster Raid
Lucas further drew inspiration from the 1955 film ‚ÄúThe Dam Busters,‚Äù which chronicles the audacious British raid on Germany‚Äôs strategic river dams in 1943. The dams were heavily defended by anti-aircraft fire, a recurring theme in ‚ÄúStar Wars.‚Äù
‚ÄúThe Death Star attack is all about combat in the face of desperate odds,‚Äù Graff wrote in
Smithsonian Magazine in 2020. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a clear homage to the epic air battles seen in movies from the 1950s and 1960s.‚Äù
The Rebels suffer catastrophic losses, and the Death Star raid, just like in 1943, teeters on the brink of failure, ‚Äúuntil a pivotal moment when [the] Millennium Falcon comes diving out of the ‚Äòsun,‚Äô a trick as old as military aviation itself,‚Äù Graff concluded.
Claire Barrett is the Strategic Operations Editor for Sightline Media and a World War II researcher with an unparalleled affinity for Sir Winston Churchill and Michigan football.

author: Celeste Guti√©rrez
title: Abundancia, estos son los 6 signos que ser√°n premiados con suerte y salud HOY | El Heraldo de M√©xico
text: Pese a su gran esfuerzo algunos signos del zodiaco a√∫n no han visto resultados positivos en diferentes aspectos de su vida, sin embargo, una fuerte racha de suerte les ayudar√° a obtener √©xito en todo lo que se propongan y, en otros, mejorar su salud por la que tanto han padecido en los √∫ltimos d√≠as generado preocupaci√≥n en sus seres queridos. Signos con buena suerte y salud Tauro Este es uno de los signos que tiene todo a su favor en lo profesional para obtener un aumento en su salario o un ascenso. Aunque los signos les piden no confiarse y continuar con el gran trabajo que han hecho hasta ahora y por el que han llamado la atenci√≥n de personas importantes, pues no son los √∫nicos que ser√°n considerados para el crecimiento laboral que se aproxima. Sigue leyendo: [Fortuna, estos son los 2 signos zodiacales que ser√°n bendecidos con suerte y amor, seg√∫n la astrolog√≠a oriental](https://heraldodemexico.com.mx/espectaculos/2024/4/17/fortuna-estos-son-los-signos-zodiacales-que-seran-bendecidos-con-suerte-amor-segun-la-astrologia-oriental-595195.html) [Dinero, estos 7 signos ser√°n premiados con suerte y ser√°n millonarios comenzando mayo 2024](https://heraldodemexico.com.mx/espectaculos/2024/4/17/dinero-estos-signos-seran-premiados-con-suerte-seran-millonarios-comenzandomayo2024-595175.html) C√°ncer Las personas bajo este signo del zodiaco gozan de un buen momento en su vida profesional con la oportunidad de expandir este √©xito a otros aspectos como en el amor, tema en el que deber√°n cuidar su coraz√≥n por una decepci√≥n amorosa que vivir√°n en los pr√≥ximos d√≠as. Los astros les advierten sobre su salud, pues la mala alimentaci√≥n que tienen podr√≠a pasarles factura en algo relacionado con su coraz√≥n. Virgo Aunque Virgo atraviesa por un buen momento en su vida personal, amorosa y familiar es probable que este d√≠a enfrenten un nuevo reto en su trabajo. Esto es algo que no deben ver como algo negativo, pues tienen todo para hacerle frente y est√° relacionado con la imaginaci√≥n y la creativa que deber√°n colocar en un nuevo proyecto a su cargo. Libra En los √∫ltimos meses este signo ha gastado m√°s de lo que puede pagar, algo sobre lo que le advierten los astros ante el poco esfuerzo que han mostrado en su lugar de trabajo. Por ello, les recuerdan la importancia de esforzarse ya que las cuentas de sus costoso estilo de vida podr√≠an provocarle otros conflictos. Capricornio Este signo de Tierra podr√≠a experimentar un fuerte problema en su lugar de trabajo por diferencias en la forma de pensar con uno de sus compa√±eros, es importante que consideren que no se trata de algo personal y trata de mantener la cordura para evitar que el conflicto crezca logrando afectarlos de manera profesional. Piscis Piscis goza de una gran fortuna en los negocios y desde antes de comenzar el 2024 ya ve√≠a despegar su emprendimiento de manera favorable. Ahora ya ve algunos de los beneficios con un importante crecimiento financiero y este d√≠a los astros les hacen saber que es buen d√≠a para firmar documentos importantes o cerrar negocios.

author: Valentina Raffio
title: L'extensi√≥ global de gel mar√≠ arriba a la xifra m√©s baixa des que hi ha registres
text:
Informe copernicus
L‚Äôextensi√≥ global de gel mar√≠ arriba a la xifra m√©s baixa des que hi ha registres
A l‚Äô√Ärtic, la superf√≠cie va ser un 8% inferior a la mitjana per a aquesta √®poca, mentre que a l‚ÄôAnt√†rtida va ser un 26% m√©s baixa del que s‚Äôesperava.
No hi havia hagut mai tan poc gel al planeta com ara mateix. Segons revela l‚Äô√∫ltim informe del Servei de Canvi Clim√†tic de Copernicus (C3S), el gran term√≤metre per entendre l‚Äôavan√ßament de la crisi clim√†tica en el conjunt del planeta, al febrer l‚Äôextensi√≥ global del gel mar√≠ va arribar a un nou m√≠nim hist√≤ric. Les dades revelen que l‚Äôextensi√≥ di√†ria del gel mar√≠ combinada, √©s a dir, la suma del gel a l‚Äô√Ärtic i l‚ÄôAnt√†rtida, va caure al seu nivell m√©s baix des que van comen√ßar les observacions satel¬∑lit√†ries el 1978. A l‚Äô√Ärtic, l‚Äôextensi√≥ del gel va ser un 8% inferior a la mitjana per a aquesta √®poca, mentre que a l‚ÄôAnt√†rtida va ser un 26% m√©s baixa. "√âs una de les moltes conseq√º√®ncies de viure en un m√≥n cada cop m√©s c√†lid", avisa Samantha Burgess, del Centre Europeu de Predicci√≥ a Mitj√† Termini (ECMWF). D‚Äôacord amb els registres, l‚Äôextensi√≥ del gel mar√≠ √†rtic ja encadena tres mesos consecutius de m√≠nims r√®cord, cosa que refor√ßa les alertes sobre el seu progressiu declivi. Tot i aix√≠, els experts remarquen que el r√®cord del febrer no vol dir que estiguem davant un m√≠nim absolut, ja que just en aquesta √®poca el gel de la regi√≥ est√† en la fase de creixement estacional i s‚Äôespera que, si no hi ha m√©s imprevistos, remuntar√† aquest mar√ß i registrar√† el seu valor m√©s alt de l‚Äôany.

author: Jake Staniland
title: Video: Watch as West Ham man embarrasses Declan Rice with wonderful piece of skill
text: It was a night to forget for Declan Rice against his former club as West Ham put on a counter-attack clinic to win 2-0 at the Emirates Stadium. Tomas Soucek put the Hammers in front in the first half when Jarrod Bowen managed to keep the ball in play at the byline and find the Czech international who fired it into an empty goal. Then in the second half, former Arsenal centre-back Konstantinos Mavropanos came back to haunt the Gunners as the Greek international sprung in the air to meet James Ward-Prowse‚Äôs effortless corner delviery to make it 2-0. Another highlight of the night came when Brazilian left-back Emerson tricked his way past his former teammate Rice, who could not get anywhere near him after being misdirected with wonderful trickery. Emerson sending Declan out for a hot dog x [pic.twitter.com/lMHWBfREph] ‚Äî West Ham Xtra (@WestHamXtra) [December 28, 2023] Rice also compounded his miserable game when he conceded a penalty right in front of the away supporters that once adored him. Luckily for the midfielder, David Raya was able to save Said Benrahma‚Äôs penalty in the final seconds of the game.

author: @httweets
title: Delhi's Pusa freezes at 3.2¬∞C; IMD extends cold wave warnings for north India | Weather updates
text:
Delhi's Pusa freezes at 3.2¬∞C; IMD extends cold wave warnings for north India | Weather updates
Thursday marked Delhi‚Äôs coldest December day in the past three years, with the overall minimum temperature dropping to 4.5¬∞C.
The minimum temperatures in Delhi‚Äôs Pusa and Ayangar areas reached 3.2¬∞C and 3.8¬∞C, respectively on Thursday, with [cold wave](https://www.hindustantimes.com/topic/cold-wave) conditions observed, according to data from the regional meteorological centre in New Delhi. The India Meteorological Department (IMD) has further predicted that cold wave conditions will persist at isolated locations in parts of North India until the weekend.
The IMD's forecast for Friday in [Delhi](https://www.hindustantimes.com/topic/delhi) predicts the[ minimum temperature](https://www.hindustantimes.com/cities/delhi-news/delhi-air-quality-returns-to-poor-category-minimum-temperature-at-8c-101733806424202.html) to be around 4¬∞C. The forecast said, ‚ÄúCold wave conditions at isolated places. Smog/mist is likely in the morning. Mainly clear sky. Smog/mist is likely in the evening/night. The maximum and minimum temperatures would be around 23 and 04 degrees Celsius respectively.‚Äù
According to the IMD, cold wave conditions occur when temperatures fall below 4.1¬∞C or when the departure from normal temperatures exceeds 4.4¬∞C below average.
Thursday marked Delhi‚Äôs coldest December day in the past three years, with the overall minimum temperature dropping to 4.5¬∞C. This was 0.4¬∞C below normal, compared to 4.9¬∞C on Wednesday, as per the IMD. The temperature had fallen sharply from 5¬∞C the previous day. Data shows that the minimum temperature did not drop below 4.9¬∞C in December 2023 and 2022.
The lowest recorded minimum temperature in December last year was 4.9¬∞C on December 15, while in 2022 it was 5¬∞C on December 26.
Meanwhile, Thursday's maximum temperature was 22.2¬∞C, 0.8¬∞C below normal, the IMD added.
Forecast for Delhi
For Friday, the[ weather department](https://www.hindustantimes.com/topic/imd) predicted a ‚ÄúMainly clear sky with cold wave conditions at isolated places. The predominant surface wind is likely to be from northwest direction with speed less than 08 kmph during morning hours. Smog/mist is likely in the morning. The wind speed will increase thereafter becoming less than 14 kmph from northwest direction during afternoon. It will decrease thereafter becoming less than 08 kmph from northwest direction during evening and night. Smog/mist is likely in the evening/night.‚Äù
For Saturday, December 14, the forecast said, ‚ÄúMainly clear sky with cold wave conditions at isolated places. The predominant surface wind is likely to be from northwest direction with speed less than 08 kmph during morning hours. Smog/mist is likely in the morning. The wind speed will gradually increase becoming 10-12 kmph from northwest direction during afternoon. It will decrease thereafter becoming less than 08 kmph from northwest direction during evening and night. Smog/mist is likely in the evening/night.‚Äù
IMD's forecast for cold wave conditions across north India
IMD predicted no significant change in minimum temperatures is expected over Northwest and Central India for the next 5 days.
A gradual fall in minimum temperatures by 2-3¬∞C is likely over East India during the next 2 days, with no significant change afterward and a gradual rise in minimum temperatures by 2-3¬∞C is expected over West India (except Gujarat) during the next 5 days, the weather department said.
Cold wave conditions are very likely in parts of Punjab and Uttar Pradesh until December 15, in isolated pockets of Haryana, Chandigarh until December 15, and in Rajasthan and Chhattisgarh until December 13.
Cold wave conditions are also expected in Madhya Pradesh until December 16, Gangetic West Bengal, Bihar, and Jharkhand until December 14, Delhi on December 13 and 14, and Jammu-Kashmir-Ladakh-Gilgit-Baltistan-Muzaffarabad from December 13 to 16.
Cold day conditions are very likely in isolated pockets of Madhya Pradesh from December 12 to 14.
Dense fog conditions are likely in isolated pockets of Sub-Himalayan West Bengal and Sikkim, Bihar until December 13, and Assam, Meghalaya, Nagaland, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura until December 17.
Ground frost conditions are very likely in isolated pockets of Uttar Pradesh on December 12 and 13.
[News](https://www.hindustantimes.com)/
[India News](https://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news)/ Delhi's Pusa freezes at 3.2¬∞C; IMD extends cold wave warnings for north India | Weather updates

author: Fox Sports
title: ¬°Siguen cayendo las medallas para M√©xico! Gilda Cota consigue la plata en impulso de bala
text:
M√©xico sigue sumando medallas en los Juegos Paral√≠mpicos 2024, y ahora fue el turno de Gilda Cota de colgarse la presea de plata en impulso de bala F33. En lo que fue el debut para la mexicana en una justa paral√≠mpica, sali√≥ avante al registrar una marca de 7.89m como su mejor de seis lanzamientos: mismo que la posicion√≥ dentro de los tres primeros lugares.
El Stade de France vio como Gilda Cota lleg√≥ como favorita en la competici√≥n tras ser la actual campeona del mundo; sin embargo, no pudo colgarse el oro, pero s√≠ obtener la presea n√∫mero 12 para el medallero general de M√©xico en los Juegos Paral√≠mpicos 2024.
Te recomendamos: ¬øCu√°ndo har√°n el pago de octubre de la Pensi√≥n ISSSTE y cu√°nto cobrar√°n los pensionados?
MEDALLA DE PLATA PARA GILDA COTA ü•àüëè‚Äî FOX Sports MX (@FOXSportsMX)
